question: 安売り
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>sell</kanji> something <kanji>cheap</kanji>, you're selling it at a <vocabulary>discount</vocabulary>. Alternatively you can remember this word as <vocabulary>sell cheaply</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>bargain sale</vocabulary>. These are good deals!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The hiragana on the end hints that the readings are the kun'yomi readings. Use your memory of <ja>安い</ja> and <ja>売る</ja> to help you to remember how to read this.
